channel.title: Blogs on Trang Bui
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Trang Bui

item.title: Why is Deep Learning good?
item.description: Thanks to the David Sprott’s Distinguished Lecture by Professor Trevor Hastie and questions raised by Professor Ali Ghodsi in the Q&A session today, I realized that several things about Deep Learning. Why they are so good, I think there are three reasons: For me, Deep Learning is just like a stack of linear models, so it is one way of ensemble models together with a certain structure, maybe hierarchical. Hence, the Deep Learning models usually contain more parameters than the classical models, which may explain why it can have better performance with bigger data.
